last_episode_to_air.name: A Journey of a Thousand Miles
last_episode_to_air.overview: High atop the mystical Kunlun Mountain, Lara faces the challenges of a goddess — and a colossal new threat — in her quest to restore order to the world.

name: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
original_name: Tomb Raider: The Legend of Lara Croft
overview: Thrust into a high-stakes chase around the world, fearless adventurer Lara Croft confronts her traumatic past while unraveling an ancient mystery.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Lara Croft must return home when a dangerous and powerful Chinese artifact is stolen from Croft Manor by a thief with an uncanny personal connection. Her daring pursuit will take her on an adventure around the world and to the depths of forgotten tombs, where she will be forced to confront her true self and decide just what kind of hero she wants to become.

episodes.name: A Single Step
episodes.overview: When a high-tech thief steals a mysterious jade artifact from Croft Manor, fearless archeological adventurer Lara Croft leaps into action to retrieve it.

episodes.name: A Set of Lies Agreed Upon
episodes.overview: Tracking the thief to a village in China, Lara and Jonah search for a group of missing children and make a remarkable discovery in an underground tomb.

episodes.name: Living Midnight
episodes.overview: Vengeful mercenary Devereaux reveals the truth behind his hunt for the peril stones. Lara infiltrates the compound of a notorious warlord in Istanbul.

episodes.name: Big Lies, Small Secrets
episodes.overview: Deep in the Paris catacombs, Lara and Interpol agent Camilla Roth uncover a mythical link between the peril stones and the Knights Templar.

episodes.name: Whanaungatanga
episodes.overview: After skydiving into Iran, Lara boards a speeding train and fights the possessed passengers to rescue an old friend from Devereaux's sinister control.

episodes.name: The Spirit Way
episodes.overview: An astrological clue sends Lara racing to the site of an ancient battle, where legend says the final peril stone resides beneath a golden tree.

episodes.name: Yinyang
episodes.overview: With time running out, Lara and Camilla lead a desperate mission to separate the peril stones from Devereaux — whose body undergoes a monstrous change.

episodes.name: A Journey of a Thousand Miles
episodes.overview: High atop the mystical Kunlun Mountain, Lara faces the challenges of a goddess — and a colossal new threat — in her quest to restore order to the world.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Lara Croft must return home when a dangerous and powerful Chinese artifact is stolen from Croft Manor by a thief with an uncanny personal connection. Her daring pursuit will take her on an adventure around the world and to the depths of forgotten tombs, where she will be forced to confront her true self and decide just what kind of hero she wants to become.
